title: How has this not been solved after 4 seasons of this game?
body: How in this game, arguably the most popular game in the entire world is there still no system to stop people from being penalised due to afkers or leaver? Every other game I played has a system in place to stop people from being punished for the actions of others. E.G the disconnecting system in DOTA 2 where players can leave the game to join another after a player leaves the game, making it unfair. I am sick of seeing myself and others around me have their lp and mmr drop due to a string of unlucky games with afkers. Where are the loss preventions Riot? Surely this has been asked before.

replies.body:
Getting loss prevented for an afk is dumb. 

Duo with a friend who doesnt care for his acc/ranked. begin to lose he afks loss prevent. Gtfo

It's been suggested for some time, the afk'ers and d/c will get a harsh ban if they do so in Ranked (like a punish if say 2 times within 3 days), while stripping only their right to join Ranked queue for the time being leaving only Normal games options open for them.

Then ofc if they still continually do so in Norms, a normal game ban will also be handed out on him.

For an individual who has received both types of ban, Ranked and Normal:

1. Ranked ban will only clear after Normal ban is finished, if the Ranked ban finishes **before **Normal ban does.

2. If the Ranked ban's finish time is **after **Normal's then normal games will be opened first without the need to wait for Ranked ban.

Something like that.

I get that the afker will be punished but why is there no compensation for the victim. Frankly, I don't give a flying %%%% if that other guy gets banned because I will never see him again. However when I lose my promos due to afkers, then I care.

Why would you get compensation? The system has never worked that way so I don't get why you would suddenly think it would be different. This is always an issue in online gaming where there is a competitive mode.

If they gave compensation to the players affected (because victim is a strong word), people would find ways to abuse the system to get loss prevented or whatever system they have in place to compensate for an afker. As mentioned elsewhere, you have a lower chance of getting a troll or afker on your team because there are only 4 people on your team who could potentially be those players (assuming you are not going to as well) and 5 on the other team.
I don't think it different I think it should be. I just got demoted due to a 4v5. This system is broken and ridiculous.
In case you haven't noticed the crying posts from the AFKers... it works, came out last week and is wrecking the afkers like miley cyrus on a semi trailer
